Verses: 1 eremiyaa Innum Kaavarchaalaiyin Mutraththile Adaikkappattirukkaiyil, Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Avanukku Irandaandharam Undaagi, Avar:
2 idhai Seygira Karththarumaai, Idhaith Thidappaduththumpadikku Idhai Uruverpaduththugira Karththarumaayirukkira Yekovaa Ennum Naamamullavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal:
3 ennai Nokkik Kooppidu, Appozhudhu Naan Unakku Uththaravu Koduththu, Nee Ariyaadhadhum Unakku Ettaadhadhumaana Periya Kaariyangalai Unakku Arivippen.
4 edhirkkoththalangalinaalum Pattayaththaalum, Idikkappattavaigalaagiya Indha Nagaraththin Veedugalaiyum, Yoodhaa Raajaakkalin Veedugalaiyunkuriththu:

5 indha Nagaraththin Ellaap Pollaappinimiththamum Naan En Mugaththai Maraiththapadiyinaale En Kobaththilum Ukkiraththilum Vettunda Manushappredhangalinaale Avaigalai Naan Nirappumpadiyaagave, Avargal Kaldheyarode Yuththampannappogiraargal.
6 idho, Naan Avargalukku Savukkiyamum Aarokkiyamum Varappanni, Avargalai Gunamaakki, Avargalukkup Paripoorana Samaadhaanaththaiyum Saththiyaththaiyum Velippaduththuven.
7 naan Yoodhaavin Siraiyiruppaiyum, Isravelin Siraiyiruppaiyum Thiruppi, Munnirundhadhupola Avargalaik Kattuviththu,

8 avargal Enakku Virodhamaaik Kutrancheydha Avargaludaiya Ellaa Akkiramangalukkum Avargalai Neengalaakki Suththigariththu, Avargal Enakku Virodhamaaik Kutrancheydhu, Enakku Virodhamaai Dhrogampannina Avargaludaiya Ellaa Akkiramangalaiyum Mannippen.

9 naan Avargalukku Seyyum Nanmaiyaiyellaam Ketkappogira Boomiyin Ellaa Jaadhigalukku Munbaaga Adhu Enakku Magizhchchiyulla Keerththiyaayum Pugazhchchiyaayum Magimaiyaayum Irukkum; Naan Avargalukku Arulichcheyyum Ellaa Nanmaiyinimiththamum, Ellaa Samaadhaanaththinimiththamum Ivargal Bayandhu Nadunguvaargal Endru Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Sollugiraar.

10 manushanillaamalum Mirugamillaamalum Avaandharaveliyaaik Kidakkiradhendru, Neengal Sollugira Ivvidaththilum, Yoodhaavin Pattanangalilum Manushanaavadhu Mirugamaavadhu Illaadha Paazhaana Erusalemin Veedhigalilum,

11 innum Kalippin Saththamum, Magizhchchiyin Saththamum, Manavaalanin Saththamum, Manavaattiyin Saththamum Senaigalin Karththaraith Thudhiyungal, Karththar Nallavar, Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhendru Sollugiravargalin Saththamum, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukku Sthoththirapaligalaik Konduvarugiravargalin Saththamum Ketkappadum Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Avargal Munnirundhadhupolirukkumpadi Dhesaththin Siraiyiruppaith Thiruppuven Endru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.

12 manushanum Mirugamum Illaamal Avaandharaveliyaaik Kidakkira Ivvidaththilum, Idharkaduththa Pattanangalilum, Aattumandhaiyai Meyththu Madakkugira Meyppargalin Thaabarangal Undaayirukkumendru Senaigalin Karththar Sollugiraar.

13 malaiththesamaana Pattanangalilum, Pallaththaakkugalaana Pattanangalilum, Thenthisaip Pattanangalilum Benyameen Naattilum, Erusalemin Sutruppurangalilum, Yoodhaavin Pattanangalilum, Aattumandhaigal Thangalaith Thogaiyidugiravanudaiya Kaikkullaagak Kadandhuvarum Endru Karththarsollugiraar
14 idho, Naatkal Varumendru Karththar Sollugiraar, Appozhudhu Naan Isravelin Kudumbaththukkum, Yoodhaavin Kudumbaththukkum Sonna Nalvaarththaiyai Niraivetruven.
15 annaatkalilum Akkaalaththilum Dhaaveedhukku Needhiyin Kilaiyai Mulaikkappannuven; Avar Boomiyile Nyaayaththaiyum Needhiyaiyum Nadappippaar.
16 annaatkalil Yoodhaa Ratchikkappattu, Erusalem Sugamaaith Thangum; Avar Engal Needhiyaayirukkira Karththar Enbadhu Avarudaiya Naamam.
17 isravel Vamsaththin Singaasanaththinmel Utkaaraththakka Purushan Dhaaveedhukku Illaamarpovadhillai.
18 thaganapaliyittu, Pojanapaliseluththi, Naaldhorum Paliyidum Purushan Enakku Munbaaga Aasaariyarukkum Leviyarukkum Illaamarpovadhumillai Endrukarththar Sollugiraar Endraar.
19 pinnum Eremiyaavukkuk Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Undaagi, Avar:

20 kuriththa Dhesangalil Pagarkaalamum Raakkaalamum Undaagaadhapadikku, Neengal Pagarkaalaththaikkuriththu Naan Pannina Udanpadikkaiyaiyum, Raakkaalaththaikkuriththu Naan Undaakkina Udanpadikkaiyaiyum Avamaakkinaal,

21 appozhudhu En Dhaasanaagiya Dhaaveedhode Naan Pannina Udanpadikkaiyum, Avan Singaasanaththil Arasaalum Kumaaran Avanukku Illaamarpogumpadiyaaga Avamaagum; En Oozhiyakkaararaagiya Leviyarodum Aasaariyarodum Naan Pannina Udanpadikkaiyum Appozhudhu Avamaagum.

22 vaanaththu Natchaththirangal Ennappadaadhadhum Kadarkarai Manal Alakkappadaadhadhumaayirukkiradhupola, Naan En Dhaasanaagiya Dhaaveedhin Sandhadhiyaiyum Enakku Oozhiyancheygira Leviyaraiyum Varththikkappannuven Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endraar.
23 pinnum Eremiyaavukkuk Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Undaagi, Avar,

24 karththar Therindhukonda Irandu Vamsangalaiyum Veruththuppottaarendru Indha Janam Solli, Thangalukku Munbaaga En Janam Ini Oru Jaadhiyallavendru Adhai Dhooshikkiraargalenbadhai Nee Kaangiradhillaiyo?
25 vaanaththukkum Boomikkum Kuriththirukkira Niyamangalai Naan Kaavaamal, Pagarkaalaththaiyum Raakkaalaththaiyunkuriththu Naan Pannina Udanpadikkai Atruppogiradhu Undaanaal,

26 appozhudhu Naan Yaakkobin Sandhadhiyaiyum, En Dhaasanaagiya Dhaaveedhin Sandhadhiyaiyum Thalli, Naan Aabiragaam Eesaakku Yaakkobu Enbavargalin Sandhadhiyai Aalaththakkavargalai Adhilirundhu Edukkaadhapadikku Veruththuppoduven; Avargaludaiya Siraiyiruppai Naan Thiruppi, Avargalukku Iranguven Endrukarththar Sollugiraar Endraar.
